examples: On 31 May the two leaders signed a peace accord.

definitions.definition: If you do something of your own accord, you do it without being asked to do it:
examples: She came of her own accord. No one asked her to come.

definitions.definition: If people do something with one accord, they do it together and in complete agreement:
examples: With one accord, the delegates walked out of the conference.

definitions.definition: to treat someone specially, usually by showing respect:
examples: [ + two objects ] The massed crowds of supporters accorded him a hero's welcome.
